Overview

Describe assembly connection: Transducer array -> motherboard -> 9 channel boards -> i2c bus controlled by FTDI breakout -> control computer Describe equipment connections: Hook power supplies to channel boards and motherboard by daisy chaining or w/e (star network), it will distribute power Describe flashing boards – Atmel compiler, something something, not full depth Describe running software on host computer – sends commands from Python over USB Describe other subsections – one per board, maybe top level scripts
